name: huginn
tagline: A system for building agents that monitor the web and automate actions
description: Huginn is a system for building agents that monitor the web and act on your behalf. You can create workflows that fetch, filter, react to and combine data from many sources, enabling powerful self hosted automation scenarios.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Create agents that monitor websites, APIs, and data sources for changes

features.title: Web Scraping
features.description: Extract data from websites and RSS feeds with customizable selectors

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Chain agents together to create complex automation scenarios

features.title: Scheduled Tasks
features.description: Run agents on schedules or trigger them based on events

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts via email, SMS, Slack, or webhooks when conditions are met

features.title: Data Storage
features.description: Store extracted data for later processing or analysis
